    • Method Detail

      • addEdge

        public void addEdge(T from,
                    T to)
        Adds vertices, and a directed edge between them. Simple directed graphs do not allow self-loops. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loop_(graph_theory)
        Parameters:
        from - Vertex value at the start of the edge
        to - Vertex value at the end of the edge
